knimeNode.name: XML BIF BN Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Read a Bayesian network stored in a file in XML BIF format

fullDescription.intro:
Read a Bayesian network stored in XML BIF format. This format is used by platforms such as WEKA, and graphical editors such as JavaBayes, Genie and Netica or Samiam. This format is documented on the website of the Carnegie Mellon University.
You might create your Bayesian network with any graphical editor such as: the good old SamIam
Please report bugs or feature demands in the github page.
.

ports.outPort: the Bayesian network decoded from the file
